title: Caring for Your Family While Parenting a Prodigal
itunes:author: Featured Guests: Pastors Bill Putman & Jim Putman
itunes:summary:
If you're pouring all your energy into parenting a prodigal child, it can be difficult to be present with your other children. John and Danny offer advice for maintaining relationships during difficult parenting seasons.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Hope for the Prodigal": https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2020-11-10?refcd=1025705

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/caring-for-your-family-while-parenting-a-prodigal/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
